body:
Day 17 - Manga 379*
Tomboys are a turn on for me so that's that.
Now, about the faces, some of them seemed like they shouldn't have been were they were, for example, on page eight, that glare didn't tell me anything about the character or why she was glaring at the guy and the full body shot right after followed by her leading the male character to somewhere seemed like a contrast, two things that shouldn't have happened in one to two pages.
Overall, the art is pretty solid but the faces could have been better.
7/10.
The first Black Lagoon Doujinshi on this site. Surely a blessed day.
